flawed_nl_solution:
When you add up all the girls from all 4 classes, you had 12+15+9+10= <<12+15+9+10=43>>43 girls
When you add up all the boys from all 4 classes, you had 13+11+13+11 = <<13+11+13+11=48>>48 boys
There are 48 boys and 43 girls so 48-43 = 5 more boys
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 46, not 43. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
